title: FLEX
description: Here you can manage your virtual shares, view the additional pension contribution, and see your monthly holiday allowance / 13th-month amounts.

salesPlan.title: My Sales Plan
salesPlan.description: You can choose to follow the KPN plan (0-16.33%) or invest extra in [Retail & Sales employees]:

pensionContribution.title: Pension Investment
pensionContribution.description: From 2026, you can contribute up to 3% to KPN Flex and Boost to invest more and build a pension.
